name: Channel Surfing (GamTam)
description:
Play as Splort, a mad lad who wants to save his progress. Flip between channels to see the entire level, and don't die.

It's definitely a vidya game.

CREDITS

Programming - GamTam, Ethan Ahn

Music/Sound - GamTam

Art/Management - Greg Gismondi

Game Design - Ethan Ahn
